content: This app takes too much effort to make it work. I was using the app for 3 days in total and it unlinked my bank account twice in 3 days, making me link it over again. Problem #2 is that I always shop using my credit card to get points. I tried to connect my credit card along with my bank account and there was no possible way to do this. I contacted support and was told that it wasn't possible because my well known bank wouldn't allow it which makes this app unusable for me to shop with.

Takes about 5 minutes to boot, tapping any button takes about 20 seconds to respond then if you're lucky, it takes 30 seconds to load your selection, most often it won't load at all. Can't rate the service offered, the app was impossible to use. Maybe its device requirement issue, but I have similar apps that work fine.

I wrote detailed review but Google didn't save it so here's the summary. Rewards linked to cards work as advertised and are great! The surveys are misleading and need to be completely reworked. I've done multiple surveys to full completion and never received the advertised points "as I didn't fit what the survey was looking for". That's a lame method to trick people into doing the questionnaires. Update the points to show the points range you can earn. Otherwise, it's just deceptive marketing

Painfully slow, essentially useless. Kept unlinking my accounts, so I was missing out on points, then finally decided it's "incompatible" with my bank. Customer service isn't great; took forever to answer my emails, suggested removing bank security procedures to link to the app. Erm, no. Not worth the effort.

I did enjoy this app but I started taking surveys and even though I completed 100% of the survey they aren't giving the correct amount of points as a reward. I know they end early and you get half points but almost everytime I'm completed a full survey they aren't giving the proper rewards for it ..something is messaged up with their system
The app is great reward wise. But it so slow to load and sometimes crashes. If you don't have patience, don't bother cause you will smash your phone into 1000 pieces.

Love the rewards system, that works fabulously. Do find the app quite laggy to use and have had issues contacting CS about points problems, found them unresponsive and contact information was either lacking or wrong.
The app is so laggy and unresponsive. Selecting anything in the user interface takes at least 10 seconds for anything to happen, if at all.

I love the drop app. Free gift cards in canada. I have been a member for around 2 years and have earned around $180 in gift cards for amazon tim hortons sephora and best buy. I love this app. And it is safe to link your bank card too.

This app is very questionable. They don't award points properly, meaning if the offer is boosted you will not get your points. The customer service is blah. Weeks without getting my points and still no help from customer service.

Has gotten so much worse. Often doesn't give rewards for you shopping or completing surveys. Any bonuses that you are entitled to from your drop spin or from boosted deals don't actually get applied. Lies about the time required to complete surveys (I'm not about to spend 25 minutes for $1). Customer service is nonexistent but I'm guessing they will be all over this review, so maybe they can help resolve my issues and give me some of the $15+ I worked and shopped for on this app.

Love that it is a free app. The offers are getting better and better all the time. So i am able to redeem on a regular basis. I always have to send a query into pts that i should have earned through an offer i emailed to myself. Of course there is always a reason why they didnt go through and they will be added. Games that i am interested in always have a message "this offer is no longer available"
replycontent: Hey Ange, thanks so much for your review! If there is any way we could make it a 5-star experience we would love to hear about it at support@joindrop.com. Be sure to reference your Play Store review so we can keep track of your case! :)

content: After writing a review, they sent me my giftcard after 6 days. Took twice as long as expected. Just wish their customer support responded back!
replycontent: Hi there, so sorry for the delay! We're currently working through an issue regarding these redemptions, but your reward should be available to you within 48 hours. We sincerely appreciate your patience.

content: Nice

THEY ABSOLUTELY RUINED THIS APP WITH THE NEW "PREMIUM OFFERS" SECTION!!!!! They shamelessly downgraded the card-linked offers, now all the offers are temporary. And WORST OF ALL, the Amazon one is demoted to a "limited-time" offer on a first-come-first-serve basis. By the time I get the notification, the Amazon offer has already been reaped empty! This is beyond ridiculously stupid. I hope this is the outcome you wanted to achieve, because youve just lost a customer. Id rate 0 stars if I could.

been using this for years and every so often it unlinks my card/bank accounts. always so much frustration when trying to contact support about it and their answer is always along the lines of "issues usually resolve in a few days. just keep trying to relink" when it's been more than 2 weeks already. it's especially frustrating now that they've added perks for simply having a linked card. the app is also still so clunky after years of being released.

The app wont open on my phone anymore. It is stuck on the "updating your app" and "checking for updates" for several minutes. Tried updating on Play Store and it still will not open properly. Can you pleade fix you app from this weird glitch? And change it so that this ridiculous update upon opening the app goes away altogether...

They refuse to honour points when there is an error on their end and you followed instructions properly. Says "cash back" but you actually get gift/e-gift cards or certificates which isnt actually cash back. It requires a lot of time and effort to get enough points for good stuff plus the app is so SLOW it feels like its hacked. They refuse to honour some bank cards even though it is a Mastercard card issued by that bank. And FINALLY, Customer service takes almost a week to get back to you!

When you shop at certain store you are suppose to get point. That work for a while. Now I only get points for games and surveys. Even when I shop at stores on the list I still don't get points. I have shopped at Safeway at least once a week and I have not got any point since the middle of September. Unfortunately the stores that are on the app are not close to me. In the last 3 months I have not got any points from McDonalds
replycontent: Hey Sheila! We‚Äôre excited to introduce Flash Deals, the takeover of Power Offers, designed to feature brands we know you‚Äôre going to love. Similar to Power Offers, you‚Äôll shop with a linked card. For more info, please submit an in-app support ticket (profile at the top left of the app, then "get help") and reference your review. Thank you!

content: Right now, I have to give this a low rating. All I can do is a few surveys or play games, most of which I either already have played in the past, which aren't applicable for points, or have zero interest for me. I have had the app.for a week now and I still can't link my cards. I keep getting a no communication message. I have contacted support and, understandably, they can't connect my card for me. But I was basically told to just keep trying. It's more trouble than it's worth right now.

Save yourself the trouble and do not download it. Might have been a decent app in the past but it just jeeps getting worse. Take forever to load stuff but the worst thing is thier support team. They totally ignore straight out, accuse you of lying and do not even attempt to solve your issues.
Such a great app. Earn points to use towards real gift cards. Love to cash in on gift cards. I save up throughout the year and use my points towards Christmas presents.

I really like the app and find the surveys/games/shopping rewards to be pretty good compared to other apps, but it is INCREDIBLY SLOW. If you guys could fix the speed lots of people would want to use this
The idea of this app is okay. And seems to work. But the app is painfully slow. Click on a button.... Wait.... Wait..... Wait.... 30 seconds later it responds. So frustrating!!
After the latest update, the app simply says "Checking for updates" when loading and then crashes. Android 10 on OnePlus 5T.
I wish I could give less than a star... doesn't even open just crashes. Messaged developer more than once and nothing...
It won't let me link my card but everything else works great, even with the card issues I am having I still highly recommend trying this for yourself....it's well worth your time.
App is always laggy and freezes all the time
An awesome app that gets me rewards just by doing my everyday purchases. The points from playing games I enjoy is a nice bonus

Not sure why there are so many bad reviews, I love this app! I find it more rewarding than ampli or checkout 51. Every week I complete the flash offer because with options like Amazon, McDonald's, or Starbucks I've always used it! I like this app over others because I don't buy things I normally wouldn't buy just to get points. I normally shop at Walmart, SportChek, indigo, etc and if you buy when they have point deals your points can add up quickly! The games and surveys also add up slowly!

I've been using the app awhile and in the beginning was skeptical, especially with the type of info they asked for... But so far nothing shady has happened. Also once in a while there is a bug and I brought it up with the support team (and true, some aspects of this could be streamlined a little) but the help I've gotten so far has always been great! So not at all regretting downloading this app

App was way better in the beginning (years ago), now almost every offer requires you to follow their link. Ampli is a far better option. My connected card hasn't earned me points in literal years, and I have shopped many of the in-store offers. Their customer service chat is automated and you can only start a ticket for 1 specific transaction at a time. No email address to inquire about a broader points issue? üëéüèΩ

I have had Drop for about 2 years now. I have earned about $200 in Lululemon gift cards pretty much through my standard spending habits. You'll need to track the points you should earn because 2/3 times, they do not get awarded to your account without following up with customer service about it. From that point of view, this app has MANY issues. It's a seriously frustrating and time consuming process at points, but I've found the rewards I've earned make it worth the effort.

Great way to earn some gift cards! The games and surveys are easy enough ways to get fast points and the points on purchases are nice too. Points and rewards delivered fast. Way underrated app. Only complaint is that I'm experiencing a bug where half the games don't work but it's still a great app.
Pretty good. A lots of deals to explore. The app is slow to respond sometime though. Generally good.
Best app to earn extra rewards on your everyday purchases. Above that you can earn by playing games and everyday. It's must have app.
App not well optimized. Not very responsive, sometimes do not respond at all.
I'm confused by the 1 star reviews, I have been using this app for years now and it's amazing. It actually pays out, I have redeemed for multiple sephora gift cards as well as others.
My experience has been great until recently. I've tried multiple times to reach out to drop support team and have yet to hear back from anyone. I would have given 5 stars if not for that

I got this app based on youtube influencer who is a no nonsense, tell it like it is person "Dr Dray" whom I trust implicitly, however I have not been so frustrated and disappointed about an app if ever! I signed up & tried to link my 3 cards and was successful on only 1. With regards to the 2 I kept getting an "error" msg that my user name & p/word was incorrect. I repeatedly tried to link thinking that I made an error with a digit but all #'s was correct. I'm so fed up and will uninstall soon
Not sure what they have done recently, got a new phone and when you go to sign in it asks you to pick two options in order to proceed with 0 options available üòè
replycontent: Hey there! We'd like to look into this, please reach out to support@joindrop.com and we'll work out what the issue seems to be. :)

content: It's a nice app but I just used it. I don't have a lot of experience for sharing. But I think if you know what to do with points. You will happy use it.

Been using app since 2016. Used to be a solid app with obtainable rewards. After changes to point system, rewards are near impossible. I have unlinked my details and moving on away from this. Highly suggest you don't waste your time trying to get anything from this.

It's fine, there are very little earnings opportunity for me. My card unlinks constantly, have to relink it every couple days. I can't wait till I have enough to cash out so I can delete this and wast of time app.
replycontent: Hi Rex, I'd love to help you here - cards can sometimes unlink repeatedly for specific reasons that we can help you clear up. Could you reach out to us through the Help links in the app so we can lend a hand? Just note that you're following up a review, and we should be able to match things up.

content: Slow and steady. And you get rewards when you are done. I have enjoyed a few gift cards so far
They only reward you when you made small purchases. When you made big purchases they will deny it with all sort of excuses. Customer service is horrible even with their manager named Chris.
UI is mostly unresponsive or VERY slow. Been a user for years but I give up.

Drop has not been able to connect to my bank for months now. Used to connect no problem and recieved lots of 'points' at two stores. Now those points are not available and I do not shop online much or from any of the retailers they offer now. Just redeemed most of my points for gift cards because I do not see a fix coming anytime soon.

Used to be a great way to save a few bucks every couple of months. Used to be automatic. Now they've changed it to require almost all shopping to be done through the app and it's a horrible experience. This app "Drop"ped down from 5 stars and is now virtually worthless. I saved about $15 in the first 6-8 months. Since then, I haven't saved a dime. It's now uninstalled.

I really liked this app at first as it was easy to accumulate points but then my credit card kept unlinking and unlinking and it took FOREVER for them to fix anything. The customer service is horrible. Takes ages for anyone to respond and if they do, they don't really do anything to help fix the issue. So I might have lost tons and tons of points while my card was unlinked. Now ... I have enough points to redeem something and I keep getting errors and it won't redeem!!!! I've been trying for 2 weeks!! I have sent a "ticket" about it and still haven't had any reply from customer service. I'm getting so annoyed. I want to use my damn points!

I love this app. It's great for collecting points! However, I've been experiencing an issue with the app glitching on the last step and not returning me to the Drop "home page", so I have to exit the app. Then the points dont show up. Then I have to email the company to get them to manually load the points (after taking screenshots and videos of the issue for proof.) It's getting annoying, and I think the people at drop are sick of me emailing them for my points. Please fix this issue ASAP!!
replycontent: Thanks so much for reaching out Katrina, We‚Äôre working hard to make this the best app it can be, and we couldn‚Äôt do it without the feedback from members like you. We would love to hear more at support@joindrop.com if you have time to go into more details!

content: I was so in love with this app, had recommended to many people. But it seems they got greedy, instead of improving for the betterment of everyone. It just feel like the carrot is always dangling in front of your face and then its gets pulled away anytime you get close. And i sense from most of the reviews that this is a common feeling felt by most users. Hopefully they smarten up soon before they really lose their popularity....(fyi Drop, your ratings are going down in case you haven't noticed).
replycontent: Hey there, we‚Äôre so sorry you encountered an issue with this offer. We are actively working with our partners to determine which members are owed points and we will get back to all affected members with an open ticket shortly. If you don‚Äôt already have a ticket, please consider submitting one to support@joindrop.com. Thanks!

content: I think this app is not worth it and it has the worst custimer support i have ever experienced. Most of the time, the rewards dont appear on your account and when you contact customer service, they take almost a week to respond. When customer service does respond, they usually come up with many new things you need to meet in order to earn your reward and ultimately dont give you yiur reward at all. The worst customer service I've ever experienced. Don't download this app.
replycontent: Hey Daniel, this doesn't sound right! Could you please submit a support ticket to support@earnwithdrop.com entitled "Google Play Store help"? We'd be happy to look into your missing points for you and get you back on track to earn lots more! :)

content: The service is a great idea and almost well executed. I had 2 vastly different experiences with their customer service - one good and one terrible. The app itself is horrible - extremely slow, extremely laggy and not optimized. Has 5 star potential if service was improved and app performance is increased by 10 - 50 times. This is the worst app performance of any app on my phone.

Was a good app until they started messing around with it too much. I have been saving my points for probably nearly a year or more now and every time I get close to getting enough to cash out they change their "cash out rules" and make it so that I have to keep going. Honestly it almost feel like it's on purpose, it has happened so many times now that I have basically given up on the app. Will use for another couple weeks to see if the under 30$ options come back then deleting
replycontent:
Hey there, we‚Äôre really sorry to hear you‚Äôre having a bad experience with us. We know it can be really frustrating when things change in the app. For a little more context on this we made an FAQ series that you can check out here: https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/categories/202567547-FAQ
Hope you have a great day!

content: Most of the time this app works as it should. Had no complaints before. Lately Ive been having difficulty receiving points on new offers. Been in contact with customer service. They are prompt at first and quite friendly, but trail off without resolving my issue. I hope it's a backlog issue. Currently it's been 1 month with no response to my original email or follow up. Besides that everything else works as suggested.

It used to work perfectly fine for me, but it keeps unlinking my cards and giving me error when I try to relink it. So I haven't been able to collect points since July 2018. Also, I have selected the option to not receive push notifications for anything, but the app sends at least 5 notifications daily, which is really annoying. I would like to delete my account in the app. Thanks

My experience with Drop has been extremely rewarding. It is very user friendly with simple easy to read instructions to shop, and earn points. I recently had an issue with redeeming a gift card, to which the customer service agent was able to respond quickly with updates on my issue and provided me with the the next steps. Within 2 hours, I received my gift card. Would definitely recommend new users to Drop.
replycontent: Hey there Jody! We're so happy to hear that you've had a seamless experience so far. Happy earning :)

content: Horrible app that has gone downhill over the last several years. I acumulated 17k points and now they have taken out all the 5$-20$ offers without warning. It will take years for you to claim something and they constantly miss points. I've had to reach out several times to request points be added. You also have to make purchases through the app now to have the privilege of spending your points. You can see from the other reviews that everyone is feeling the same way, avoid this app.
replycontent: Hey Elston, we‚Äôre really sorry to hear you‚Äôre having a bad experience with us. We are working hard on new features that will provide you with more opportunities to earn points and customize your Drop experience. If you have any other questions please don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know at support@joindrop.com. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Use to be a great app. I signed up for drop super early on, I loved it and took a chance when everyone thought it was sketchy to attach your credit cards. When you signed up you picked 5 stores that you would always get points for shopping at. They made a big deal about picking wisely because you can never change them. Well then they decided to change them by taking them away. And there was no communication sent out telling you that. I cashed out my points and left, not worth it now.

I followed the directions of an offer perfectly, but was not given the $12.50 in points which was promised. I spent $30 expecting to receive the points. I requested help after the allotted time, customer service said they can't give the points. So don't spend money on offers, since it is a risk that you will not receive the points. So far I haven't had issues on linked offers.

This is a great app to collect points with. And thats about it, because every time you go to redeem the points, the system changes or the tiers disappear. My original goal was a $10 starbucks card. Then $25 amazon. Both those options have disappeared from the redemption menu. But theres still the $50 starbucks card redeemable? Its a great idea, but stop changing the system so people can actually reach their goals.
replycontent: Hey Sarah, thanks for your feedback. Our offers and rewards change from time to time, and we have rolled out a lot of new ways to earn more points: contests, arcade games, offers over 25,000 points, deals, referral bonuses, and more. Please reach out to us at support@joindrop.com (and be sure to reference your review) for tips on earning with Drop!

content: beware of offers, they do not give you all the points for boosted offers. i've raised four tickets and are aware that i did not get all the points i should have but either stop following up or close my ticket immediately. app is slow and prone to crashes or not loading anything at all. UPDATE: problem was resolved, but it took a couple months. probably will not trust boosted offers, but will continue to use the app.

Don't like how they changed the reward options. Doesn't make any sense to have to shop thru the app in order to redeem under 30. Would be one thing if those rewards were available at higher levels. I don't mind saving up 30,000 in order to get an old Navy or Amazon gift card but now I can't even redeem for one.

Two years later, still can't change the base offers. Half the point accumation rates don't make sense‚Äîsometimes it's 4 points per dollar and sometimes it's 40. Also, it seems like over half the offers are only for online purchases, rendering the app useless for those of us who want to, you know, try on something for size
replycontent: Hey Dion, we've heard this kind of feedback from our users, so we've made it possible to change your Power Offers once you've referred a friend to Drop! :) If you ever have any questions with regards to point rates, we'd be happy to explain them or let you know how many points per dollar your offers are worth!

content: I have still NOT yet even ONCE been able to even sign in. SO CLEARLY, I'VE SAVED NO MONEY. I have tried on an android, IOS, and windows. I've tried to contact customer service without any solutions. Not impressed at all. The only thing it would say to anything I tried was "AN ERROR HAS OCCURRED". Terrible experience. I had a lot of shopping to do as well. I was looking forward to trying it. Instead I wasted a bunch of my time for something that never worked once.

It has worked fine up to some point although there was an ongoing card linking issue which hasn't been fixed for months. I used it for it being still usable but since about a week ago the app is completely not working. I tried reinstalling on three different devices to make sure it's not an account or a phone issue, but after signing in the app wouldn't load from a blank white page. I really liked the concept of this app but due to the poor build quality I am deleting this app.
replycontent: Hey there, sorry to hear that! There have been recent changes to banks we are able to support due to some infrastructure updates. We'll ensure that going forward we are more careful with what financial institutions are displayed.

content: takes a full minute to open and is very slow to respond when everything else on my phone opens fine, which is really baffling. the UI is also extremely unintuitive - I really hate the nested menus that scroll both horizontally and vertically and need to be expanded. the variety of rewards has improved and the program is good as a whole, but I I just wish the app made sense. a desktop or even a web client would also help greatly, especially given the new range of online shopping offers.

great app, points really add up and value is well worth it compared to ebates. the support team is really prompt and efficient. my only issue would be that i wish there was a search function as it can take time to look for a specific shop (that you know is there) by going through all the categories. All in all a great app, would recommend! edit to 5 - app now has a search function
replycontent: Hey there, thanks for the rave review! That search function really comes in handy, and users like you made that clear to us. Thanks for the feedback and for being a faithful Drop member! :)

content: It's not good, I mean I didn't even try to go farther than the link cards point. The app forces you to choose between 5 brands that I just use Starbucks and it's not even fair that they don't have more options. In the pictures of the app they show different brands as best buy or Amazon but it's a completely lie. Really bad app, hopefully in the future or would be better.

I can't redeem points that were earned with boosted points. Also, didn't receive pending points for well over 2 months now. Just shows they are pending. I contacted customer service, which was useless. They told me my account was being reviewed for suspicious activity. They closed the ticket with no explanation or reason why I cant redeem points. My points are only worth $20, does this look suspicious. Don't bother, not worth the hassle.

Drop is horrible now, I used to redeem my points right away now you have to shop thru the app to redeem your points, I used to get 10 dollars worth of gift cards from Amazon now it has to be 25 dollars. I don't want to shop thru drop there's nothing I'm interested in buying with the brand's. I have 33 dollars worth of points but I can't use them. I'm very disappointed. Why do people have to change something and make it horrible for users?
replycontent: Hey there, we‚Äôre really sorry to hear you‚Äôre having a bad experience with us. If you would like to send us a message, including this username or a reference to this review, at support@joindrop.com we would be happy to go over the policy change and your options. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Decent app. Points come in slow but consistent for the regular supercharge purchases. However I signed up for Tangerine account which is supposed to reward 25,000 points 30 days after completion. My account has been open for almost 2 months and nothing has come through. I've also opened tickets regarding the missing points multiple times through the app but have not heard or seen any changes.  Edit:  Was contacted and the points were added.

Used to be a fantastic app, loved just collecting points for going about my day. However, I can no longer access the app. Every time i open it i get "network issues" error. My connection is fine, the problem seems to be with the app. Very disappointed and frustrated to have one of my favourite apps completely broken.

The app itself works great, no bugs, no issues. Points for Walmart, mcdonalds, Tim Hortons all show up within a couple of days. However, I signed up for Disney+ back at the end of March and have yet to receive my points for it. Ive made numerous purchases through clearly, Sephora and other shopping links and none of my points show up for those either. Customer service is pretty unless when you contact them about them about these issues.
replycontent: Hey Kate! Oh no, missing points sounds like something we should definitely look into for you! Could you please send us an email to support@joindrop.com? Please reference this review, that will help us make sure we have all the information to get started on investigating this. Hopefully, we can straighten everything out!

content: The customer service is atrocious. Takes days to respond, and they don't address the issue. I'm still waiting for points to be credited to my account after I completed an offer. They delay interactions by continuously suggesting that perhaps you haven't followed the steps, which is false and misleading. I seldom comment on things, but don't share your information with them.

I love the app, but I also have serious issues with it. I've had several offers which were "boosted" but never received the boosted points, just the normal points. Customer service is non-existant. You message them and they don't get back to you. Also, getting the points for completed game requirements is hit and miss. Some I've gotten a few days after completion, others it's been over 2 months and nothing. They REALLY need to fix customer service.
replycontent: Hey Charlene, I'm certain we can turn this 3-star review into a 5-star review. Could you please send us an email to support@joindrop.com? Please reference this review, that will help us make sure we have all the information to get started on investigating this. Hopefully, we can get this all resolved. Thanks!

content: They got terrible support process for resolving issues. If you need to exit the app, you have to press back two times. I don't know why. Its been an year never rexeived my referral reward points. And its been more than three months they keep on saying we are working in redeeming your reward amd will soon update you. I can't wait for that sooner any more now.
replycontent: Hey there, Thanks for letting us know! We encourage you to submit a support ticket in-app or alternatively send an email to support@earnwithdrop.com with the subject line "Play Store Help" and we would be more than happy to help! We look forward to hearing from you!

content: So disappointed in the changes in this app.. I used to give it 5 stars but now I only give it 1. Gift cards are much harder to obtain and you are forced to shop through the app to get lower valued gift cards to unlock....which sucks when you don't do a huge amount of online shopping. Also, since the change my linked card points are not being added... I have shopped numerous times in the the past two weeks and only have gotten points for two transactions. Don't waste your time!
replycontent: Hey Jason, thanks for your feedback on the app. We rely on feedback from members like you to help make this the best app it can be. For the missing points issue you mentioned we hope you'll reach out at support@joindrop.com so we can look into this for you! Hope you have a great day!

content: It was good. When it worked... Have had issues with my credit card several times months at a time. Then I'd have to manually tally my cards. It's now been unlinked for almost a year. No progress. Just that they're aware and working on it. I have hundreds if not thousands of points missing cuz of this
replycontent: Hey Jess, we understand card-linking issues can be frustrating. We are working with our providers to find a resolution with some of the banks that are having connectivity issues. Please send us a message if you need any support, support@joindrop.com.

content: This app is a great concept but has shaky execution. Sometimes it's great and you can get points towards gift cards easily. Other times you complete an offer only to never see the points promised. It's very hit or miss right now, which is a shame as I would otherwise recommend it to people. Also their drop spin game always crashes the app. Every time.
replycontent: Hey Jared, thanks so much for reporting this Drop Spin issue. It has since been fixed! I hope it's working for you now. If there is any way we could make it a 5-star experience (like adding missing points) we would love to hear about it at support@joindrop.com. Be sure to reference your review so we can keep track of your case! :)

content: Been using this app since 2017 and over the past year they've made changed that make the app frustrating to use. You used to be able to make points for simple everyday purchases, now you have to buy something through the app to get points. I wanted to cash out my years worth of points so I could delete the app but apparently any reward under 75,000 has to be "unlocked" by buying something through their app! Why should I have to spend money to unlock points I've had for years? Makes no sense.

Drop used to be great but you can no longer earn the way the app was originally intended. They took away my 5 stores and now you only earn through "flash deals" with a ridiculous minimum $ purchase or by buying things at places you don't shop at through their app. I do not recommend wasting your time, go to one of the other points apps that are still fair.

Used to enjoy the app immensely, recommended it to so many friends. I was okay with the trade off: giving the app person information and my spending habits on which the app would make a profit in exchange for a little gift card every now and then. Now to even try to redeem I have to have an ungodly amount of points and make a purchase in a store I either wouldn't shop at or have no interest shopping at at the time. Not worth it

content: This app is nothing like Ebates do not link your card because once you link your card it makes it very difficult to unlink your card. content: Y'all. I always have friends recommending this app or that to save money and I'm like "Eh pass...too much work. I just don't have time to plan and strategize to save .50 here and there." Imagine my surprise seeing that it was rewarding me automatically for trips to Target, HEB, Walmart etc that I was making without even THINKING about Drop. Listen guys, download it and set it up and then forget about it like I did. Until you remember it and find out that Drop didn't forget about you. Drop is the perfect way to get rewards for what you already do...or hey, actively watch point offers. But honestly, I am sincerely impressed with an app that is so absolutely easy to earn points on that can be traded for real rewards.

content: Drop is refusing to give me 31k points due to me using a giftcard in my purchase even though their terms and conditions say "giftcard purchases", which makes it seem like buying gift cards will not get points, not using a gift card that barely even covers 1/4 of the transaction. I have had Drop for about 2 years now. I have earned about $200 in Lululemon gift cards pretty much through my standard spending habits. You'll need to track the points you should earn because 2/3 times, they do not get awarded to your account without following up with customer service about it. From that point of view, this app has MANY issues. It's a seriously frustrating and time consuming process at points, but I've found the rewards I've earned make it worth the effort.

Great way to earn some gift cards! The games and surveys are easy enough ways to get fast points and the points on purchases are nice too. Points and rewards delivered fast. Way underrated app. Only complaint is that I'm experiencing a bug where half the games don't work but it's still a great app.
